long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Screen Time - Website Blocker by Time
Take control of your browsing habits with Screen Time! This Chrome extension helps you stay focused by allowing you to block specific websites for a set duration. Simply enter the websites you want to block, set the time limits, and let Screen Time keep you on track. Perfect for improving productivity, minimizing distractions, and managing your time online effectively.

Features:

Block websites for custom time periods
Easy-to-use interface for quick setup
Manage and adjust your blocked sites list anytime
Stay focused and boost productivity
